section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion for the Court to announce in 75-1721, United States against Chadwick and for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court filed this morning.
The judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Brennan filed an opinion concurring and Mr. Justice Blackmun with whom Mr. Justice Rehnquist joined filed a dissenting opinion.
